name: Hearth and Home
description:
Reunite your family after your children have been scared off into the dark, cold wilderness. Play as a father coal gathering up his ember children and bring them back to their mother bonfire. 

Gather kindling to expand your home, and bring your children some marshmallows! Controls are only WASD/joystick. 

Made for the Global Game Jam 2019, on a team of 6 people + 2 audio folks. 

Credits: 
Team Lead and game idea: Bryan Tai
Design, programming, graphic design: Cole Beernaerts
Cutscene design, 3D props: Tommy Zhang
VFX, player model: Bruno
Audio design: Eylul Tao
Artwork, effects: Margaret
Sound: Yeji Jung - Yejijung.sound@gmail.com
Music: Jeffrey Yiu - Batterfingers.music@gmail.com / Batterfingersmusic.com
